verses.verse: וְלִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei of the sons אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron מַחְלְקוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4256><s%> mach-le-ko-Tam; Now [these are] the divisions בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, of Aaron נָדָב֙ <S%H5070><s%> na-Dav Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <S%H30><s%> va-'a-vi-Hu, and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> ve-'i-ta-Mar. and Ithamar

וַיָּ֨מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died נָדָ֤ב <S%H5070><s%> na-Dav But Nadab וַאֲבִיהוּא֙ <S%H30><s%> va-'a-vi-Hu and Abihu לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem, their father וּבָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nim and had no children לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu and had לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem; like וַֽיְכַהֲנ֔וּ <S%H3547><s%> vay-cha-ha-Nu, executed the priest's office אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar therefore Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> ve-'i-ta-Mar. and Ithamar

וַיֶּֽחָלְקֵ֣ם <S%H2505><s%> vai-ye-chal-Kem distributed דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David וְצָדוֹק֙ <S%H6659><s%> ve-tza-dOk them both Zadok מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar, of Eleazar וַאֲחִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> va-'a-chi-Me-lech and Ahimelech מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons אִיתָמָ֑ר <S%H385><s%> 'i-ta-Mar; of Ithamar לִפְקֻדָּתָ֖ם <S%H6486><s%> lif-kud-da-Tam according to their offices בַּעֲבֹדָתָֽם׃ <S%H5656><s%> ba-'a-vo-da-Tam. in their service

וַיִּמָּצְא֣וּ <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-ma-tze-'U found בְֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֡ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar of Eleazar רַבִּ֞ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim And there were more לְרָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> le-ra-Shei chief הַגְּבָרִ֛ים <S%H1397><s%> hag-ge-va-Rim men מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- than בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei than of the sons אִיתָמָ֖ר <S%H385><s%> 'i-ta-Mar of Ithamar וַֽיַּחְלְק֑וּם <S%H2505><s%> vai-yach-le-Kum; and [thus] were they divided לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei Among the sons אֶלְעָזָ֜ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar of Eleazar רָאשִׁ֤ים <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shim chief men לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- of the house אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> a-Vot of [their] fathers שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah six עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar, teen וְלִבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei among the sons אִיתָמָ֛ר <S%H385><s%> 'i-ta-Mar of Ithamar לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit according to the house אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam of their fathers שְׁמוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Nah. and eight

וַיַּחְלְק֥וּם <S%H2505><s%> vai-yach-le-Kum Thus were they divided בְּגוֹרָל֖וֹת <S%H1486><s%> be-go-ra-Lot by lot אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh one sort עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh; with another כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become שָֽׂרֵי־ <S%H8269><s%> sa-rei- for the governors קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> ko-desh of the sanctuary וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rei and governors הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, [of the house] of God מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei were of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar of Eleazar וּבִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-viv-Nei and of the sons אִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> 'i-ta-Mar. of Ithamar ס sa-Mek

וַֽיִּכְתְּבֵ֡ם <S%H3789><s%> vai-yich-te-Vem wrote שְֽׁמַֽעְיָה֩ <S%H8098><s%> she-ma'-Yah And Shemaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son נְתַנְאֵ֨ל <S%H5417><s%> ne-tan-'El of Nethaneel הַסּוֹפֵ֜ר <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer the scribe מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַלֵּוִ֗י <S%H3881><s%> hal-le-Vi, [one] of the Levites לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei them before הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king וְהַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> ve-has-sa-Rim and the princes וְצָד֣וֹק <S%H6659><s%> ve-tza-Dok and Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, the priest וַאֲחִימֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H288><s%> va-'a-chi-Me-lech and Ahimelech בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֶבְיָתָ֔ר <S%H54><s%> 'ev-ya-Tar, of Abiathar וְרָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> ve-ra-Shei and [before] the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot, of the fathers לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-lal-vi-Yim; and Levites בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- household אָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> 'av principal אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one אָחֻז֙ <S%H270><s%> 'a-Chuz being taken לְאֶלְעָזָ֔ר <S%H499><s%> le-'el-'a-Zar, for Eleazar וְאָחֻ֥ז׀ <S%H270><s%> ve-'a-Chuz and [one] taken אָחֻ֖ז <S%H270><s%> 'a-Chuz taken לְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> le-'i-ta-Mar. for Ithamar פ Peh

וַיֵּצֵ֞א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze came forth הַגּוֹרָ֤ל <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral lot הָרִאשׁוֹן֙ <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-shOn Now the first לִיה֣וֹיָרִ֔יב <S%H3080><s%> li-Ho-ya-Riv, to Jehoiarib לִֽידַעְיָ֖ה <S%H3048><s%> li-da'-Yah to Jedaiah הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni. the second
לְחָרִם֙ <S%H2766><s%> le-cha-Rim to Harim הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, The third לִשְׂעֹרִ֖ים <S%H8188><s%> lis-'o-Rim to Seorim הָרְבִעִֽי׃ <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I. the fourth

לְמַלְכִּיָּה֙ <S%H4441><s%> le-mal-ki-Yah to Malchijah הַחֲמִישִׁ֔י <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi, The fifth לְמִיָּמִ֖ן <S%H4326><s%> le-mi-ya-Min to Mijamin הַשִּׁשִּֽׁי׃ <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi. the sixth

לְהַקּוֹץ֙ <S%H6976><s%> le-hak-kOtz to Hakkoz הַשְּׁבִעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, The seventh לַאֲבִיָּ֖ה <S%H29><s%> la-'a-vi-Yah to Abijah הַשְּׁמִינִֽי׃ <S%H8066><s%> hash-she-mi-Ni. the eighth

לְיֵשׁ֙וּעַ֙ <S%H3442><s%> le-ye-Shu-a' to Jeshua הַתְּשִׁעִ֔י <S%H8671><s%> hat-te-shi-'I, The ninth לִשְׁכַנְיָ֖הוּ <S%H7935><s%> lish-chan-Ya-hu to Shecaniah הָעֲשִׂרִֽי׃ <S%H6224><s%> ha-'a-si-Ri. the tenth

לְאֶלְיָשִׁיב֙ <S%H475><s%> le-'el-ya-Shiv to Eliashib עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H6249><s%> 'ash-Tei eleven עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar, ten לְיָקִ֖ים <S%H3356><s%> le-ya-Kim to Jakim שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

לְחֻפָּה֙ <S%H2647><s%> le-chup-Pah to Huppah שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah three עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar, ten לְיֶֽשֶׁבְאָ֖ב <S%H3428><s%> le-ye-shev-'Av to Jeshebeab אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. teen

לְבִלְגָּה֙ <S%H1083><s%> le-vil-Gah to Bilgah חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar, teen לְאִמֵּ֖ר <S%H564><s%> le-'im-Mer to Immer שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah six עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. teen

לְחֵזִיר֙ <S%H2387><s%> le-che-Zir to Hezir שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah seven עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar, teen לְהַפִּצֵּ֖ץ <S%H6483><s%> le-hap-pitz-Tzetz to Aphses שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Nah eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. teen

לִֽפְתַחְיָה֙ <S%H6611><s%> lif-tach-Yah to Pethahiah תִּשְׁעָ֣ה <S%H8672><s%> tish-'Ah nine עָשָׂ֔ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar, teen לִֽיחֶזְקֵ֖אל <S%H3168><s%> li-chez-Kel to Jehezekel הָעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> ha-'es-Rim. the twentieth

לְיָכִין֙ <S%H3199><s%> le-ya-Chin to Jachin אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad The one וְעֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim, and twentieth לְגָמ֖וּל <S%H1577><s%> le-ga-Mul to Gamul שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim the two וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim. and twentieth

לִדְלָיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H1806><s%> lid-la-Ya-hu to Delaiah שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah The three וְעֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim, and twentieth לְמַֽעַזְיָ֖הוּ <S%H4590><s%> le-ma-'az-Ya-hu to Maaziah אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah the four וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim. and twentieth פ Peh

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These פְקֻדָּתָ֞ם <S%H6486><s%> fe-kud-da-Tam These [were] the orderings לַעֲבֹדָתָ֗ם <S%H5656><s%> la-'a-vo-da-Tam, of them in their service לָב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> la-Vo to come לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- into the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֔ם <S%H4941><s%> ke-mish-pa-Tam, according to their manner בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad under אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem; their father כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֔הוּ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Va-hu, had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

וְלִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei of the sons לֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi of Levi הַנּוֹתָרִ֑ים <S%H3498><s%> han-no-ta-Rim; And the rest לִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei [were these] Of the sons עַמְרָם֙ <S%H6019><s%> 'am-Ram of Amram שֽׁוּבָאֵ֔ל <S%H7619><s%> shu-va-'El, Shubael לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the sons שׁוּבָאֵ֖ל <S%H7619><s%> shu-va-'El of Shubael יֶחְדְּיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H3165><s%> yech-de-Ya-hu. Jehdeiah

לִרְחַבְיָ֑הוּ <S%H7345><s%> lir-chav-Ya-hu; Concerning Rehabiah לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the sons רְחַבְיָ֔הוּ <S%H7345><s%> re-chav-Ya-hu, of Rehabiah הָרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh the first יִשִּׁיָּֽה׃ <S%H3449><s%> yish-shi-Yah. [was] Isshiah

לַיִּצְהָרִ֣י <S%H3325><s%> lai-yitz-ha-Ri Of the Izharites שְׁלֹמ֔וֹת <S%H8013><s%> she-lo-Mot, Shelomoth לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the sons שְׁלֹמ֖וֹת <S%H8013><s%> she-lo-Mot of Shelomoth יָֽחַת׃ <S%H3189><s%> Ya-chat. Jahath

וּבְנָ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nai And the sons יְרִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H3404><s%> ye-ri-Ya-hu; [of Hebron] Jeriah אֲמַרְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H568><s%> 'a-mar-Ya-hu [the first] Amariah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, the second יַחֲזִיאֵל֙ <S%H3166><s%> ya-cha-zi-'El Jahaziel הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, the third יְקַמְעָ֖ם <S%H3360><s%> ye-kam-'Am Jekameam הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I. the fourth

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei [Of] the sons עֻזִּיאֵל֙ <S%H5816><s%> 'uz-zi-'El of Uzziel מִיכָ֔ה <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah, Michah לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the sons מִיכָ֖ה <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah of Michah; שָׁמוּר sha-mur כשָׁמִֽיר׃ <S%H8053><s%> sha-Mir. Shamir ק

אֲחִ֤י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi The brother מִיכָה֙ <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah of Michah יִשִּׁיָּ֔ה <S%H3449><s%> yish-shi-Yah, [was] Isshiah לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the sons יִשִּׁיָּ֖ה <S%H3449><s%> yish-shi-Yah of Isshiah זְכַרְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Ya-hu. Zechariah

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons מְרָרִי֙ <S%H4847><s%> me-ra-Ri of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <S%H4249><s%> mach-Li [were] Mahli וּמוּשִׁ֔י <S%H4187><s%> u-mu-Shi, and Mushi בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons יַעֲזִיָּ֥הֽוּ <S%H3269><s%> ya-'a-zi-Ya-hu of Jaaziah בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No. Beno

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons מְרָרִ֑י <S%H4847><s%> me-ra-Ri; of Merari לְיַֽעֲזִיָּ֣הֽוּ <S%H3269><s%> le-ya-'a-zi-Ya-hu by Jaaziah בְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No, Beno וְשֹׁ֥הַם <S%H7719><s%> ve-Sho-ham and Shoham וְזַכּ֖וּר <S%H2139><s%> ve-zak-Kur and Zaccur וְעִבְרִֽי׃ <S%H5681><s%> ve-'iv-Ri. and Ibri
